Invest a little time to get used to aiming in Deathmatch and you will have more fun playing Casual.  Valve needs to do more to detect the frankly obvious cheats in Casual though, instant aimlocks, spinbots, speed hacks, and that youtube guy who never plays just spams audio at full volume.  Software could easily detect and ban these but for some reason it doesn't happen.
